response: To submit a complaint, go to your Student Dashboard and click on 'Submit Complaint'. Fill in the title, description, category, and attach any relevant files. Once submitted, its status will be 'Open'.
You can track your complaints in the 'Complaint History' section of your Dashboard. The status will show as 'Open', 'In Progress', or 'Resolved'.
Resolution times vary depending on the category and complexity. The assigned department staff usually aims to begin 'In Progress' work within 24-48 hours.
You can upload up to 3 attachments (images or documents like PDF/Docx) when submitting a complaint to help clarify your issue.
If you forgot your password, please contact the IT Helpdesk directly or ask the Administrator. A self-service password reset is not currently available.
Available categories include Academic (e.g., grading issues), Facilities (e.g., broken equipment), IT (e.g., wifi problems), and Administrative (e.g., registration issues).
Once a staff member completes the necessary work, they will mark your complaint as 'Resolved'. You can view staff remarks in the ticket details.
